item.description:
Salem Lions First Annual Trivia Night to benefit Salem Lions Charities

This event has already started to fill up: There is a $15.00 entry fee per person: You can form your own team or be paired up with someone or just play on your own :) 4-6 per team (don't forget to create a team Name)

   1st Place winner is $300.00  2nd place is $100.00

                                 50/50 Raffles  T shirts and many more Surprises 

                                         Food & Drink with a Cash bar 

                                 Space is 1st come 1st Serve So call me to reserve your spot: 

                                 Tickets will be sold at the Door, however due to high demand it      

                                 could be limited:) So grab your friends and get in place. 

 I can be reached at 617-680-5768 or you can call our President of Salem Lions 

 Dave Eng's Florist @ 136 1/2 Derby Street in Salem to pay and reserve a spot :)

This will be a fun filled night for everyone that attends: If you dont want to play and want to come and chill that is fine you still have to pay the $15.00 fee (sorry, all proceeds goes to Salem Lions charities)

Come get stumped with the Salem Lions :)

You will need to mail me a check payable to Salem Lions C/O Katie Sirois 25 Eastern Ave Lynn MA 01902 so I can reserve a spot....for you or for a team Thank you
item.name: 1st Annual "Smart Ass" trivia night to benefit Salem Lions
